articles.author: Kim Lyons
articles.title: WhatsApp fined $267 million for breaching EU privacy law - The Verge
articles.description: Ireland’s Data Protection Commission has fined Facebook-owned messaging app WhatsApp $267 million for breaching the European Union’s GDPR privacy law.
articles.content:
The company says it plans to appeal
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Facebook-owned WhatsApp has been fined 225 million ($267 million) for breaking the European Unions data privacy rules. Ir… [+1338 chars]

articles.author: EUobserver
articles.title: No need for vaccine-booster jabs, EU agency says - EUobserver
articles.description: People who already had two anti-Covid jabs do not need further booster shots, the European centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), an EU agency in Sweden, said Wednesday. "There is no urgent need for the administration of booster doses of vaccin...
